title: Chandigarh | Call on revised pay scales after PU’s board of finance meet on March 11 - Hindustan Times
content: Chandigarh | Call on revised pay scales after PU’s board of finance meet on March 11  Hindustan Times
description: With PU planning to implement the revised pay scales for teaching and non-teaching staff, the varsity’s annual budget is estimated to reach ₹1,014 crore
